init.title: Solar Window System Configuration
init.description: Set up the basic parameters for the Solar Window System. All settings can be changed later.

data_description.min_solar_radiation: Minimum radiation (in W/mÂ²) for the calculation to be active.
data_description.min_sun_elevation: Minimum sun elevation (in degrees) for the calculation to be active.
data_description.weather_warning_sensor: A binary sensor that indicates a weather warning (e.g., storm). If 'on', the blinds will close.
data_description.forecast_temperature_sensor: A sensor that provides the temperature forecast for the day. Used for advanced scenarios.
data_description.delete_weather_warning_sensor: Select this to remove the weather warning sensor.
data_description.delete_forecast_temperature_sensor: Select this to remove the forecast temperature sensor.
